name: ThievesOfSeas
description:
Goal: To fight and destroy Ghost Ships and Mini Ships with your drunk whale Jerry.

Controls 

WSAD movement, the boat shifts speeds based off how many times you press 'W' or 'S'

TAB- Open and Closes Inventory

Left Click on Items in Inventory and assign to hot bar

1,2,3,4 Use the Item in the Hot bar Slots

ESC- takes you back to main menu
